name: Return
desc: Centaur counters all attacks, dealing damage back to the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.

name: Fate's Edict
desc: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them 100% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.

name: Earthshock
desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

name: Haunt
desc: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt. Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.

name: Enchant
desc: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Reincarnation
desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Disruption
desc: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

name: Degen Aura
desc: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

name: Dispersion
desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

name: Flame Guard
desc: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
